p: Vero cells at 80% confluence in 24-well plates were infected with the ZIKV-Nluc virus. After incubation in 5% CO 2 at 37 °C, the cells were lysed with passive lysis buffer at the indicated time points. Luciferase activities were measured by using the Nano-Glo ® Luciferase Assay System (Promega), according to the manufacturer's instructions.
